General.Name: MJ Harvest Inc
General.Description: MJ Harvest, Inc. develops, acquires, and distributes agricultural and horticultural tools and implements to growers and operators in the hemp and cannabis retail industry. It offers the DeBudder Lids and EDGE brands products, and soil and soil additive products used in growing and harvesting of crops through distributors and its websites procannagro.com and procannagro.ca. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: 9205 West Russell Road, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89139
